## Get the coordinates

```{r}
library(ggmap)
coords <- geocode("GESIS Mannheim")
```


## Get a scalable map

```{r,warning=F,message=F}
library(magrittr)
library(leaflet)
m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=coords$lon, lat=coords$lat, popup="GESIS Mannheim")
m  # Print the map
```
